title: MSI GTX 1060 3gb only getting 50-60 fps?
body: I linked my build. My drivers are updated to the latest, and I did turn off the xbox dvr thing. I don't get whats happening with the low fps?

replies.body: check leagues options / settings menu there is a cap frame rate option, maybe that's it. Trust me its not your system

You didn't list your display. If you're running a G-Sync Display, you may want to hop into your Nvidia control panel and temporarily disable G-Sync, as it's been causing FPS issues lately. If you aren't using G-Sync, or disabling it caused no change, you may have issues with your Windows power settings are having a problematic background app causing issues with your framerate. I'd suggest going through our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to confirm the common fixes for this aren't going to resolve it.

Please let me know if you continue to experience issues after taking those steps.
